xml.data:
Home » 39P4 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikadukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (4) » 1 Tika, Hetuduka » 1.2 Vedanāttika, Hetuduka » 1.2.2 Nahetupada » 1.2.2.1--6 Paṭiccādivāra
Paccayacatukka
Tika, Hetuduka
Vedanāttika, Hetuduka
Nahetupada
Paṭiccādivāra
Paccayacatukka
30.
99Sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
100Dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca dukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
101Adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1) (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
31.
102Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe tīṇi…pe…  avigate tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
103Nahetuyā tīṇi, naadhipatiyā tīṇi, napurejāte dve, napacchājāte tīṇi, naāsevane tīṇi, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke tīṇi…pe…  navippayutte dve. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
104(Sahajātavārampi…pe…  sampayuttavārampi vitthāretabbaṃ.)
